content.content:
CREATE TABLE posts
(
    Id                    INTEGER          not null UNIQUE
        primary key,
    PostTypeId            INTEGER          null,
    AcceptedAnswerId      INTEGER          null,
    CreaionDate           DATETIME     null,
    Score                 INTEGER          null,
    ViewCount             INTEGER          null,
    Body                  TEXT     null,
    OwnerUserId           INTEGER          null,
    LasActivityDate       DATETIME     null,
    Title                 TEXT null,
    Tags                  TEXT null,
    AnswerCount           INTEGER          null,
    CommentCount          INTEGER          null,
    FavoriteCount         INTEGER          null,
    LastEditorUserId      INTEGER          null,
    LastEditDate          DATETIME     null,
    CommunityOwnedDate    DATETIME    null,
    ParentId              INTEGER          null,
    ClosedDate            DATETIME     null,
    OwnerDisplayName      TEXT null,
    LastEditorDisplayName TEXT null,
        foreign key (LastEditorUserId) references users (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade,
        foreign key (OwnerUserId) references users (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade,
        foreign key (ParentId) references posts (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade
);

content.content:
CREATE TABLE votes
(
    Id           INTEGER  not null
        primary key,
    PostId       INTEGER  null,
    VoteTypeId   INTEGER  null,
    CreationDate DATE null,
    UserId       INTEGER  null,
    BountyAmount INTEGER  null,
        foreign key (PostId) references posts (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade,
        foreign key (UserId) references users (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade
);

    BountyAmount INTEGER  null,
        foreign key (PostId) references posts (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade,
        foreign key (UserId) references users (Id)
            on update cascade on delete cascade

content.text: None of the posts with "data visualization" in the title have 83 votes. Let me also check the total votes across all these posts combined, just in case.

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/codebase_community.sqlite" "SELECT SUM(vote_count) FROM (SELECT COUNT(v.Id) as vote_count FROM posts p LEFT JOIN votes v ON p.Id = v.PostId WHERE p.Title LIKE '%data visualization%' GROUP BY p.Id);"
input.description: Sum all votes across data visualization posts

content.text:
The sum of all votes across all posts with "data visualization" in the title is exactly 83. However, the claim says "**the** post about data visualization received 83 votes" (singular), implying a single post. There are actually 16 posts with "data visualization" in the title, and no single one of them has 83 votes. The total across all of them is 83.

The claim says "the post" (singular) received 83 votes. No single post about data visualization received 83 votes — 83 is the combined total across all such posts. This is **CONTRADICTED** because no individual post matches the claim.

Wait, let me reconsider. The hint says "About data visualization is the Title that contains 'data visualization'". The claim says "the post about data visualization" — it could be interpreted as referring to all votes associated with posts about data visualization collectively. But the claim uses the singular "the post", which is ambiguous. Let me re-examine more carefully — perhaps we should look at the Score column too.
